title: Snug Li’l Room
description: Three dozen young adults trapped in one extremely cramped bachelor apartment! (It mostly shows that people go crazy when they don’t have their own space.)
quote: Corbyn, we all have soup on this table. There’s just no room.
alt1: coffee table with four large bowls of soup, another bowl is spilled on the floor
alt2: two dudes screaming at each other
alt4: same girl throwing a salad in a dude’s face
